actions.committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Ground Transportation.

official_title: To amend the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Bridge Authority Act of 1995 to provide for continued engineering, design, right-of-way acquisition, and construction related to the project to upgrade the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Bridge.

summary.text: Amends the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Bridge Authority Act of 1995 to direct the Secretary of Transportation to approve, and authorize the Secretary, the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Bridge Authority, and any Capitol Region jurisdiction to proceed with, the engineering, design, right-of-way acquisition, and construction related to the project to upgrade the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Bridge.

titles.title: To amend the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Bridge Authority Act of 1995 to provide for continued engineering, design, right-of-way acquisition, and construction related to the project to upgrade the Woodrow Wilson Memorial Bridge.
